罞字的基本解释

罞
máo
捕捉麋鹿的网。

罞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［máo］
［《廣韻》莫紅切，平東，明。］
(1)捕获麋鹿的网。
(2)同“茅”。

罞字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【网字部】　罞； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页947第24
【廣韻】【正韻】莫紅切【集韻】【韻會】謨蓬切，?音蒙。【爾雅·釋器】麋罟謂之罞。【註】冒其頭也。　又【廣韻】莫交切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】謨交切，?音茅。義同。　又【集韻】莫候切，音茂。義同。

罞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
罞字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
罞
máo
Nets for catching elk.
罞
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［máo］
["Guangyun" Mo Hongqie, Pingdong, Ming. ]
(1) A net for catching elk.
(2) Same as "Mao".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Net Word Department] 　罞; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Pages: 947-24
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Mo Hongqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Mo Pengqie,? Yin Meng. 【Erya·Release Device】The moose is called the 罞. [Note] Take the risk.　 [Guang Yun] Mo cross cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Hui] [Zheng Yun] Mo cross cut,? Yin Mao. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Mo Houqie, Yinmao. The same meaning.
